name: Voidwarped Renegade
author: guitarninja
lore:
In the center of the galaxy lies a cosmic anomaly known as the Vortex Gate, a swirling maelstrom of energy and power that defies comprehension. The Stellar Vanguard, humanity's elite interplanetary marines, once stood as protectors of peace and justice, defending the far reaches of the cosmos from threats both internal and external.

Unaware of the malevolent forces lurking within the Vortex Gate, the Vanguard embarked on a daring mission to investigate its mysteries. They believed that understanding and harnessing its energy could grant them an unprecedented advantage in defending the universe. Led by their most skilled and revered commander, Captain Talvar Thorne, they approached the Vortex Gate with caution and determination.

As the Stellar Vanguard drew near the enigmatic gateway, they were engulfed by its powerful currents. The energies within the gate were not of this reality, and its dark tendrils reached into their souls, seeking vulnerabilities to exploit. Unprepared for the sheer malevolence they encountered, the Vanguard's minds and spirits were overwhelmed by the chaotic forces within the Vortex Gate.

The once-honorable and valiant marines were twisted and corrupted by the malevolent energies. Their eyes glowed with an eerie, ominous light, and their once-dignified armor became tainted with dark, swirling patterns. The Stellar Vanguard had been transformed into something entirely different â€“ the Voidwarped Renegade.

Their loyalty to mankind was replaced with an insatiable desire for power and control. Their purpose shifted from protecting the innocent to seeking dominion over all they encountered. The corrupted energies amplified their physical abilities and granted them sinister new powers, which they used to subjugate other civilizations, planets, and even their former comrades.

Captain Alexia Hartwell, once the pinnacle of leadership and valor, became the malevolent Sovereign of the Voidwarped Renegade. Under her command, the Voidwarped Renegade sought to spread darkness and chaos throughout the cosmos. They attacked the very worlds they once vowed to protect, causing devastation and fear wherever they went.

The corruption within the Vortex Gate had transformed the Stellar Vanguard into relentless and merciless beings, fueled by an insatiable hunger for power. Their dark and ominous presence became a harbinger of doom, and their conquests left a trail of suffering and destruction in their wake.

Their sinister legacy spread like a plague, and the galaxy recoiled in horror at the once-heroic Stellar Vanguard's transformation. The Voidwarped Renegade became the embodiment of fear and malevolence, shrouded in legend and whispered warnings to those who dared to venture near the Vortex Gate.

While the Stellar Vanguard's fall was a devastating tragedy, there were those who believed that redemption was still possible. A secret resistance group, comprised of individuals from various species, emerged to challenge the Voidwarped Renegade and free their former comrades from the dark grip of the Vortex Gate.

The conflict between the Voidwarped Renegade and the resistance waged on, spanning worlds and dimensions. It was a battle of epic proportions, where the forces of darkness sought to engulf the universe in eternal night, while the resistance fought to restore the once-heroic legacy of the Stellar Vanguard.

In the heart of the galaxy, the Vortex Gate stood as a constant reminder of the corruption that had befallen the Stellar Vanguard. The fate of the cosmos hung in the balance as the battle between light and shadow raged on, a testament to the enduring power of darkness and the indomitable spirit of those who fought to reclaim their fallen comrades from the abyss.

voidwarped_warmaster.name: Voidwarped Arch-Marine of War
voidwarped_warmaster.description: Once one of Humanity's favoured, this powerful Marine now seeks only to watch the galaxy burn.

arch_pest.name: Pestilent Arch-Marine
arch_pest.description: This Arch-Marine is the end result of the Pestilent Marines' vile necrobiotics and bioweapons research.

arch_berzerker.name: Berserk Arch-Marine
arch_berzerker.description: An icon of pure incandescent rage. Nothing remains once this Arch-Marine attacks.

arch_mage.name: Voidwarped Psychic Arch-Marine
arch_mage.description: Built as a psycho-biological weapon, this Arch-Marine defied his destiny and joined the dark gods.

lord_on_infernal_stalker.name: Voidwarped Lord on Infernal Stalker
lord_on_infernal_stalker.description: An infernal creation that crawls on the ground, stalking its prey.

voidwarped_champion.name: Voidwarped Champion
voidwarped_champion.description: A champion of the dark gods.

voidwarped_champion_on_bike.name: Voidwarped Champion on Bike
voidwarped_champion_on_bike.description: A champion of the dark gods riding a combat bike.

voidwarped_lord.name: Voidwarped Lord
voidwarped_lord.description: A lord of the dark gods.

voidwarped_lord_on_bike.name: Voidwarped Lord on Bike
voidwarped_lord_on_bike.description: A lord of the dark gods riding a combat bike.

voidwarped_lord_on_warbeast.name: Voidwarped Lord on Warbeast
voidwarped_lord_on_warbeast.description: A lord of the dark gods riding a biomechanical monster.

voidwarped_engineer.name: Voidwarped Engineer
voidwarped_engineer.description: Twisted by the dark gods, this marine is dedicated to repairing corrupted machines.

voidwarped_engineer_on_bike.name: Voidwarped Engineer on Bike
voidwarped_engineer_on_bike.description: Riding a combat bike, this marine is dedicated to repairing corrupted machines.

voidwarped_psychic.name: Voidwarped Psychic
voidwarped_psychic.description: A potent psychic who has turned to the dark gods.

voidwarped_psychic_on_bike.name: Voidwarped Psychic on Bike
voidwarped_psychic_on_bike.description: A potent psychic riding a combat bike.

demonic_champion.name: Demonic Champion
demonic_champion.description: A massive demon gifted by the dark gods.

lord_of_pestilence.name: Lord of Pestilence
lord_of_pestilence.description: A lord of death and decay.

pestilence_surgeon.name: Pestilence Surgeon
pestilence_surgeon.description: A combat medic who has spreads disease across the battlefield.

voidwarped_priest.name: Voidwarped Priest
voidwarped_priest.description: A devotee of the dark gods who seeks to spread their faith to non-believers on the battlefield.

voidwarped_priest_on_bike.name: Voidwarped Priest on Bike
voidwarped_priest_on_bike.description: A devotee of the dark gods on a combat bike who seeks to spread their faith to non-believers on the battlefield.

voidwarped_priest_on_warbeast.name: Voidwarped Priest on Warbeast
voidwarped_priest_on_warbeast.description: A devotee of the dark gods on a biomechanical monster who seeks to spread their faith to non-believers on the battlefield.

cultists.name: Cultists
cultists.description: Lunatics who have sold their souls to the dark gods.

cultist_berzerkers.name: Cultist Berzerkers
cultist_berzerkers.description: Rage-filled lunatics who have sold their souls to the dark gods.

maurauder_squad.name: Traitor Marauder Squad
maurauder_squad.description: A group of highly aggressive Planetary Defense deserters who can handle some close quarters fighting.

plague_walkers.name: Plague Walkers
plague_walkers.description: Unfortunate souls who have been mutated into walking undead.

birdman_sorcerer.name: Birdman Sorcerer
birdman_sorcerer.description: A mutated half avian-half man sorcerer that leads demonic forces of magic.

birdmen.name: Birdmen
birdmen.description: Mutated half avian-half man creatures that fight with the psychic brothers to achieve their goals.

voidwarped_marines.name: Voidwarped Marines
voidwarped_marines.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods.

voidwarped_veterans.name: Voidwarped Veterans
voidwarped_veterans.description: Marines that have spent long service to the dark gods.

pestilence_marines.name: Pestilence Marines
pestilence_marines.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods.

pestilence_destroyers.name: Pestilence Gravite Assault Squad
pestilence_destroyers.description: Destroyers that are infected with pestilence.

pestilence_elite_destroyers.name: Pestilence Elite Gravite Squad
pestilence_elite_destroyers.description: Destroyers that are infected with pestilence.

pestilence_hauler.name: Pestilence Hauler
pestilence_hauler.description: A lightly armored living strike vehicle.

pestilence_mortar_tank.name: Pestilence Mortar Tank
pestilence_mortar_tank.description: An armored tank helmed by Pestilence Marines equipped with a deadly mortar.

voidwarped_berzerkers.name: Voidwarped Berzerkers
voidwarped_berzerkers.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods with rage.

recon_marines.name: Recon Marines
recon_marines.description: A lightly armed and armoured squad sent to scout and sow dissent.

psychic_marines.name: Psychic Marines
psychic_marines.description: Marines corrupted by the dark gods with potent psychic powers.

psychic_veterans.name: Psychic Veterans
psychic_veterans.description: Elite marines corrupted by the dark gods with potent psychic powers.

psychic_destroyers.name: Psychic Destroyers
psychic_destroyers.description: Deadly destroyers corrupted by the dark gods with potent psychic powers.

voidwarped_devastators.name: Voidwarped Devastation Squad
voidwarped_devastators.description: A squad of highly trained Voidwarped Renegade armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

voidwarped_heavy_devastators.name: Voidwarped Heavy Devastation Squad
voidwarped_heavy_devastators.description: A squad of highly trained Voidwarped Renegade armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

possessed_marines.name: Possessed Marines
possessed_marines.description: A squad of Voidwarped Renegade that have been gifted with demonic mutations to aid them in battle.

greater_possessed_marines.name: Greater Possessed Marines
greater_possessed_marines.description: A squad of Voidwarped Renegade that have been gifted with greater demonic mutations to aid them in battle.

demon_spawn.name: Demonic Spawn
demon_spawn.description: Horribly mutated beings that run rampant on the battlefield.

talon_raptors.name: Talon Raptors
talon_raptors.description: A squad of elite Voidwarped Renegade jumping into the fray with a jetpack.

voidwarped_destoyers.name: Voidwarped Destroyers
voidwarped_destoyers.description: Destroyers that have been corrupted by the dark gods.

mutated_destoyers.name: Mutated Destroyers
mutated_destoyers.description: Destroyers that have been mutated by the dark gods.

voidwarped_apc.name: Voidwarped APC
voidwarped_apc.description: A durable transport built by Voidwarped Renegade.

corrrupted_battle_tank.name: Voidwarped Battle Tank
corrrupted_battle_tank.description: An armored tank helmed by Voidwarped Renegade.

voidwarped_heavy_battle_tank.name: Voidwarped Heavy Battle Tank
voidwarped_heavy_battle_tank.description: An heavy armored tank helmed by imperial marines.

voidwarped_juggernaut.name: Voidwarped Juggernaut
voidwarped_juggernaut.description: A corrupted attack walker upgraded with infernal weapons.

voidwarped_fiend.name: Voidwarped Fiend
voidwarped_fiend.description: A vicious beast of twisted metal and flesh made to dominate the battlefeild.

spider_walker.name: Spider Walker
spider_walker.description: An infernal machine built to mimic a venomous spider.

warp_beast.name: Warp Beast
warp_beast.description: An amalgamation of corupted flesh whose power is harnessed by a massive portal on its back.

crab_walker.name: Crab Walker
crab_walker.description: A huge demonic creation of metal which is powered by the souls of its victims.

havoc_dragon.name: Voidwarped Dragon
havoc_dragon.description: A living metal airplane designed to drag other aircraft out of the air.

titanic_destruction_engine.name: Titanic Destruction Engine
titanic_destruction_engine.description: A giant, treaded robot designed only to kill.

giant_metal_scorpion.name: Giant Metal Scorpion
giant_metal_scorpion.description: A giant metal scorpion. It hates you. It hates everything.

warmaster_tactics.name: Warmaster Tactics
warmaster_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll all failed Accuracy tests 
 * Re-roll all failed Strength tests

pest_tactics.name: Pestilent Tactics
pest_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll all failed Save rolls 
 * Re-roll all failed Strength tests

doom_siren.name: Doom Siren
doom_siren.description: Enemy units within 6" of this model suffer -1 Courage.

archmage_tactics.name: Arch-Psyker's Tactics
archmage_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly units with the Power special rule within 6".  Those units may reroll dice rolls of 9+ while using the Power ability until the end of the round.

archmage.name: Blessings of the Psyker God
archmage.description: When this unit casts the Arcane Barrage Power, double the number of hits it deals.

warding_staff.name: Warding
warding_staff.description: Enemy units suffer -1 to all Power(x) test while within 12" of this model.

hate.name: Hate
hate.flavor: Full with fury, Voidwarped Renegade can launch devastating close combat assaults.
hate.description: Use before an Infantry unit fights. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.

daemonforge.name: Daemonforge
daemonforge.flavor: Imbued with demonic energy, traitor vehicles can call upon the powers of the dark gods.
daemonforge.description: Use before a _Vehicle_ unit is targeted by an attack. Roll a D10 for each hit. On a 3 or less that hit is prevented.

fearless.name: Fearless
fearless.description: Use before activating a unit. That unit may immediately remove up to 2 Shock.
fearless.flavor: Marines are trained to stay strong even in the toughest fights.

legend_psychic_prowess.name: Psychic Prowess
legend_psychic_prowess.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Prowess(1).
legend_psychic_prowess.flavor: This hero has studied the magic arts and is adept at invoking powers.

legend_staff.name: The Warding Staff
legend_staff.description: Replace one Leader model's Energy Staff with The Warding Staff.
legend_staff.flavor: This staff has the power to absorb and stop psychic energy.

legend_flamethrower_pistol.name: The Psychic Inferno Pistol
legend_flamethrower_pistol.description: Replace one Hexed Flamethrower Pistol with The Psychic Inferno Pistol
legend_flamethrower_pistol.flavor: This pistol is enhanced with fiery magic immolating those at longer range.

legend_unholy_strength.name: Unholy Strength
legend_unholy_strength.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Unholy Strength.
legend_unholy_strength.flavor: Those that pray to the dark gods reveive blessings beyond human comprehension.

legend_war_veteran.name: War Veteran
legend_war_veteran.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Fearless.
legend_war_veteran.flavor: This hero has lived through so many battles that nothing can phase it anymore.

legend_accursed_rifle.name: Accursed Rifle
legend_accursed_rifle.description: Replace one Leader model's Marine Rifle with the Accursed Rifle.
legend_accursed_rifle.flavor: This ancient relic emits an aura of malice, shooting purified hatred.

balefire.name: Balefire
balefire.description: Target enemy unit within 24" take 3 hits with AP(1).

hex.name: Hex
hex.description: Target enemy unit within 12" must re-roll one die of your choice on its next Save test.

sap_strength.name: Sap Strength
sap_strength.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 3 hits with AP(1) and has -1 Strength until the end of the turn.

arcane_bolt.name: Arcane Bolt
arcane_bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 24" takes 1 hit with AP(4). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 3 hits with AP(3). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

arcane_barrage.name: Arcane Barrage
arcane_barrage.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 5 hits with AP(1). This power may be cast unlimited times per turn.

deadly_miasma.name: Deadly Miasma
deadly_miasma.description: Target enemy unit within 18" take 6 hits with AP(2).

unholy_vitality.name: Unholy Vitality
unholy_vitality.description: Target friendly unit within 12" heals 1 lost wound.

spreading_plague.name: Spreading Plague
spreading_plague.description: Roll a d10 for every enemy unit within 12". On a 3 or less that unit takes 4 hits with AP(1).
